text: Record JOBS DAY!! 223K jobs added. Unemployment is 3.8%, lowest in 50 yrs. Black and Asian unemployment hit historic new lows. Adult men and women, and teenagers, are at lowest since 2000. Hourly earnings are up! Tax CUTS are working. America is WINNING BIG under President Trump!

text: A new chapter of American Greatness is now beginning. #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: I am asking all citizens to embrace this Renewal of the #AmericanSpirit. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text:
We are one people, with one destiny.

We all bleed the same blood.

We all salute the same flag.

And we are all made by the same God.
author: POTUS

text: Think of the marvels we can achieve if we simply set free the dreams of our people. #AmericanSpirit #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: We want harmony and stability, not war and conflict. We want peace, wherever peace can be found. #JointAddress #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: Ryan’s legacy is etched into eternity. #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: My budget will increase funding for our Veterans. Our Veterans have delivered for this nation. Now we MUST deliver for them. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: We must provide the men and women of the U.S. Military with the tools they need to prevent war and – if they must – TO FIGHT AND TO WIN.
author: POTUS

text: We must support the incredible men and women of law enforcement. #JointAddress #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: EVERY American child should be able to grow up in a safe community, to attend a great school, and to have access to a high-paying job.
author: POTUS

text: Education is the civil rights issue of our time. I am calling for an education bill that funds school choice for disadvantaged youth.
author: POTUS

text: The time has come to give Americans the freedom to purchase health insurance across state lines! #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: We must ensure that Americans with pre-existing conditions have access to coverage. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: Obamacare is collapsing – and we must act decisively to protect all Americans. Action is not a choice, it is a necessity. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: I am calling on Congress to REPEAL & REPLACE OBAMACARE with reforms that expand choice, increase access, lower costs & provide better care.
author: POTUS

text: The time has come for a new program of national rebuilding that will be guided by two core principles: Buy American, and Hire American!
author: POTUS

text: I believe in free trade, but it also must be FAIR TRADE. I'm not going to let our great companies and workers be taken advantage of anymore!
author: POTUS

text: My team is developing historic tax reform that will reduce the tax rate on our companies & provide massive tax relief for the middle class.
author: POTUS

text: We must restart the engine of the American economy, making it easier for companies to do business in the US & much harder for them to leave!
author: POTUS

text: Solving these problems will require us to tap into the #AmericanSpirit that has overcome every challenge throughout our storied history.
author: POTUS

text: In the last 8 years, the past Administration has put on more new debt than nearly all other Presidents combined. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: It is not compassionate, but reckless, to allow uncontrolled entry from places where proper vetting cannot occur. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: As we speak, we are removing gang members, drug dealers and criminals that threaten our communities and prey on our citizens. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: My Administration has answered the pleas of the American people for immigration enforcement and border security. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: We will stop the drugs from pouring into our country & poisoning our youth, and we will expand treatment for those who have become addicted.
author: POTUS

text: I have issued a new directive that American pipelines must be made with American steel. #JointAddress #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: Above all else, we will keep our promises to the American People. #JointAddress #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: America must put its own citizens first, because only then can we truly Make America Great Again! #JointAddress #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: A surge of optimism is placing impossible dreams firmly within our grasp. What we are witnessing today is the Renewal of the #AmericanSpirit
author: POTUS

text: I am here tonight to deliver a message of unity and strength, and it is a message deeply delivered from my heart. #JointAddress
author: POTUS

text: We are a country that stands united in condemning hate and evil in all of its very ugly forms. #JointAddress
author: POTUS
